// File: src/pages/Home.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Code, Palette, BarChart3, Camera, PenTool, Globe, CheckCircle, Users, Briefcase, Award, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const features = [ { icon: , title: "Post Projects", description: "Easily create and manage projects with detailed requirements" }, { icon: , title: "Find Talent", description: "Discover skilled freelancers with our advanced search system" }, { icon: , title: "Quality Work", description: "Get exceptional results from vetted professionals" } ]; const categories = [ { name: "Development", icon: , count: "1,234" }, { name: "Design", icon: , count: "987" }, { name: "Marketing", icon: , count: "765" }, { name: "Photography", icon: , count: "543" }, { name: "Writing", icon: , count: "432" }, { name: "Translation", icon: , count: "321" }, ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Find Perfect Freelance Services

Connect with skilled professionals from around the world. Get your projects done quickly and efficiently.

{isAuthenticated ? ( Go to Dashboard ) : ( <> Get Started Browse Freelancers )}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose FreelanceHub

We provide the best platform for clients and freelancers to connect and collaborate

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Categories Section */}

Popular Categories

Browse through our most popular service categories

{categories.map((category, index) => (
{category.icon}
{category.name}
{category.count} freelancers
))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of clients and freelancers who are already benefiting from our platform

{!isAuthenticated && (
Hire Freelancers Become a Freelancer
)}
); }; export default Home;
